content: **crocheted heart-shaped christmas decoration in drops cotton light theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no cluster-110 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** width = approx 8 cm length = approx 10 cm with loop **materials** drops cotton light from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 02 white 1 heart weighs approx 5 g **crochet gauge** 20 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
